      • prepareToDetectPhase

        public static void prepareToDetectPhase(int compiler,
                        java.lang.String sourceFolder,
                        java.lang.String lib,
                        java.lang.String time)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Prepare the for the detect phase of the program.
        Parameters:
        compiler - The compiler that will be used.
        sourceFolder - The source folder that the program will analyze.
        lib - The library folder in which the analysis depend of.
        time - The time (in seconds) to generate tests (with Randoop).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When some XML cannot be read.

        time - The time (in seconds) to generate tests (with Randoop).

      • saveResultsInXML

        public static void saveResultsInXML(java.lang.String path)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Copy the file results.xml generated from the categorization to another file specified.
        Parameters:
        path - The path where the file will be copied.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the path is invalid.
